A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Such a frustrating movie to watch. The worst part is a sloppy set of stories\, following characters on their pointless side quests\, through the film; the auxiliary stories do not even effect the main plot! Also\, so many things about being in space are taken too lightly; how could a spaceship have an open cabin with people running around without oxygen suits and space just outside - the rebel bombers at the beginning; if there is an invisible barrier\, you must show it!
